this_title: パラノイアストリート 管の町
introduction: A collection of Shintaro Kago's strange off-beat live action shorts based on several of his manga stories. Including Paranoia Street in which the future Japan uses tubes to dispose of their bodily waste and what happens when the system breaks down. White Yarn Earings, where a woman finds a strange piece of thread growing from her head. what is it for? And five more silly shorts.
foreign_title: パラノイアストリート 管の町
